Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.iHruvh0FiUFh3EDH]{Distance Rifle Specialist}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.eVkte6l1Uj5F8e5f]{Recoil Management}

Benefits

When firing an anti-materiel rifle while using a magnified optic of 1.5x or greater, the Combat Point cost is 3 less, when clearing a jammed anti-materiel rifle, the Combat Point cost is 10 less, and when attempting to repair an anti-materiel rifle, the character gains a +6 bonus. Also, when firing an anti-materiel rifle while using a magnified optic of 1.5x or greater, the recoil penalty is reduced by Â½. Also, for the purpose of feats, anti-materiel rifles are considered sniper rifles .
